001package org.jfree.chart.renderer;
002
003
004import java.util.Map;
005import org.jfree.chart.labels.ItemLabelPosition;
006import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
007import java.io.Serializable;
008
009public class AbstractRendererProduct implements Serializable, Cloneable {
010        private Map<Integer, ItemLabelPosition> negativeItemLabelPositionMap;
011        private ItemLabelPosition defaultNegativeItemLabelPosition;
012
013        public Map<Integer, ItemLabelPosition> getNegativeItemLabelPositionMap() {
014                return negativeItemLabelPositionMap;
015        }
016
017        public void setNegativeItemLabelPositionMap(Map<Integer, ItemLabelPosition> negativeItemLabelPositionMap) {
018                this.negativeItemLabelPositionMap = negativeItemLabelPositionMap;
019        }
020
021        public ItemLabelPosition getDefaultNegativeItemLabelPosition() {
022                return defaultNegativeItemLabelPosition;
023        }
024
025        public void setDefaultNegativeItemLabelPosition2(ItemLabelPosition defaultNegativeItemLabelPosition) {
026                this.defaultNegativeItemLabelPosition = defaultNegativeItemLabelPosition;
027        }
028
029        /**
030        * Returns the item label position for all negative values in a series.
031        * @param series   the series index (zero-based).
032        * @return  The item label position (never  {@code  null} ).
033        * @see #setSeriesNegativeItemLabelPosition(int,ItemLabelPosition)
034        */
035        public ItemLabelPosition getSeriesNegativeItemLabelPosition(int series) {
036                ItemLabelPosition position = this.negativeItemLabelPositionMap.get(series);
037                if (position == null) {
038                        position = this.defaultNegativeItemLabelPosition;
039                }
040                return position;
041        }
042
043        /**
044        * Sets the default negative item label position and, if requested, sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
045        * @param position   the position ( {@code  null}  not permitted).
046        * @param notify   notify registered listeners?
047        * @see #getDefaultNegativeItemLabelPosition()
048        */
049        public void setDefaultNegativeItemLabelPosition(ItemLabelPosition position, boolean notify,
050                        AbstractRenderer abstractRenderer) {
051                Args.nullNotPermitted(position, "position");
052                this.defaultNegativeItemLabelPosition = position;
053                if (notify) {
054                        abstractRenderer.fireChangeEvent();
055                }
056        }
057
058        /**
059        * Sets the item label position for negative values in a series and (if requested) sends a  {@link RendererChangeEvent}  to all registered listeners.
060        * @param series   the series index (zero-based).
061        * @param position   the position ( {@code  null}  permitted).
062        * @param notify   notify registered listeners?
063        * @see #getSeriesNegativeItemLabelPosition(int)
064        */
065        public void setSeriesNegativeItemLabelPosition(int series, ItemLabelPosition position, boolean notify,
066                        AbstractRenderer abstractRenderer) {
067                this.negativeItemLabelPositionMap.put(series, position);
068                if (notify) {
069                        abstractRenderer.fireChangeEvent();
070                }
071        }
072
073        public Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
074                return (AbstractRendererProduct) super.clone();
075        }
076}
